projects.title: DIET GENIE
projects.aim: The aim of this project is to generate a customisable Diet plan.
projects.primaryImageDescription: This website is designed and intended to provide a smooth and user friendly experience to the end users.

projects.title: NIRVANA
projects.primaryImageDescription: Nirvana is a music discovery and recommendation platform. It tracks your listening habits to provide personalised music suggestions.
projects.secondaryImageDescription: Nirvana is a platform that provides tools and opportunities for emerging artists to promote their music, connect with fans, and book gigs.

projects.title: Revitalize
projects.primaryImageDescription: Online salon booking system to make it easy for clients to schedule appointments.
